thread.title: The 7 facts about John Terry's red card vs Peterborough that will most embarrass the Chelsea captain
thread.title_full: The 7 facts about John Terry's red card vs Peterborough that will most embarrass the Chelsea captain

author: Richard Innes
title: The 7 facts about John Terry's red card vs Peterborough that will most embarrass the Chelsea captain
text:
Sport The 7 facts about John Terry's red card vs Peterborough that will most embarrass the Chelsea captain The stats that reveal the true horror of the Chelsea legend's unfortunate sending off in the FA Cup Third Round Share Not John Terry's finest hour (Photo: Darren Walsh) Share Get Chelsea FC updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Oh dear, John Terry. 
Chelsea may have breezed through their FA Cup Third Round tie against Peterborough, but it STILL turned out to be an absolute stinker of a day for their captain. 
Here are a series of numbers which prove why this particular red card - for taking out he last man, in a professional foul - is really, really going to sting for the 36 year-old defender… 11 
The number of games Terry has spent sat on the sidelines since his last start for Chelsea (against West Ham in the EFL Cup, on 26 October 2016). He finally gets back in and… (Photo: Shaun Botterill) 50 
The match against Peterborough was his 50th FA Cup start. Not the best way to mark an anniversary. (Photo: Reuters) 1 
This was the first red card of Chelsea's season. So, the other lads who play every game manage to avoid getting sent off. JT comes in and… (Photo: Darren Walsh) 50% 
Three of the last six red cards Chelsea have received have been shown to John Terry. YIKES. (Photo: Gareth Copley) 3-0 
The scoreline against Peterborough when JT took out Peterborough’s Lee Angol. Not exactly a 'necessary' professional foul, then. (Photo: Getty Images) 1 
Number of bizarre, inexplicable slips, leading to this unfortunate incident. Where have we seen that before? (Photo: Shaun Botterill) 
Approximate number of football fans currently refusing to show JT any sympathy… Like us on Facebook
